about_the_game: Embark on a musical quest as Bread & Fred jump, climb, and swing their way to perilous new heights in order to get the band back together! The Backstreet Moles, a famous underground sensation, have all lost their way on the road to Beakville. Super Duper Ultra Redux Mixtape chronicles that journey as Bread & Fred discover a broad array of musical genres, plotting a course that will have you experiencing the climb of your lives in an all new way. Paying tribute to Bread & Fred's original soundtrack by Tomas Palazzi, guest artists Grant Kirkhope (Banjo-Kazooie, Donkey Kong 64, GoldenEye 007), Dale North (Wizard of Legend, Disney Wish), FamilyJules (Crypt of the NecroDancer: AMPLIFIED), Substantial (PUBG Mobile), BigGiantCircles (Mass Effect 2), and more come together to celebrate not only Bread & Fred's adventure, but yours as well!
detailed_description: Embark on a musical quest as Bread & Fred jump, climb, and swing their way to perilous new heights in order to get the band back together! Paying tribute to Bread & Fred's original soundtrack by Tomas Palazzi, guest artists Grant Kirkhope (Banjo-Kazooie, Donkey Kong 64, GoldenEye 007), Dale North (Wizard of Legend, Disney Wish), FamilyJules (Crypt of the NecroDancer: AMPLIFIED), Substantial (PUBG Mobile), BigGiantCircles (Mass Effect 2), and more come together to celebrate not only Bread & Fred's adventure, but yours as well!
